trans-unit.source: Enables Compensating Resource Manger (CRM) on the tagged application.
trans-unit.target: Habilita o CRM (Gerenciador de Recursos de Compensação) no aplicativo marcado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this attribute.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso deste atributo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.ApplicationCrmEnabledAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.ApplicationCrmEnabledAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.ApplicationCrmEnabledAttribute" /> class, setting the <see cref="P:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.ApplicationCrmEnabledAttribute.Value" /> property to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.ApplicationCrmEnabledAttribute" />, configurando a propriedade <see cref="P:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.ApplicationCrmEnabledAttribute.Value" /> como <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enable Compensating Resource Manager (CRM); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para habilitar o CRM (Compensating Resource Manager), caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.ApplicationCrmEnabledAttribute" /> class, optionally setting the <see cref="P:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.ApplicationCrmEnabledAttribute.Value" /> property to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.ApplicationCrmEnabledAttribute" />, configurando opcionalmente a propriedade <see cref="P:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.ApplicationCrmEnabledAttribute.Value" /> como <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) on the tagged application.
trans-unit.target: Habilita ou desabilita o CRM (Compensating Resource Manager) no aplicativo marcado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if CRM is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o CRM estiver habilitado; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.
